column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Ordered in for a working lunch. Unfortunately when you're still working by the time you actually get to sit down to eat your food is cold. But having said that
column2: the salad was delish. They're dressing is what makes the difference. Â It's sweet and tangy. I believe we had the thin crust pizza
column3: cut into squares. Even cold it was good. Hopefully on my next trip to Chicago I can visit the restaurant and enjoy it fresh and hot.
